title: Fiddlehead Fern
medium: watercolor with goache, crayon and pencil on paper
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. John P. Davis, Jr.
provenance_text:
William Austin Kienbusch [1914-1980], New York, NY and Cranberry Island, ME. Kraushaar Galleries, New York, NY, until July 1997; Mr. and Mrs. John P. Davis, Jr., Pittsburgh, PA and Verona, PA, July 1997 until December 7, 2006 [1]; gift to Carnegie Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 2006.

Notes:
[1]. Mr. Davis purchased the work from Kraushaar Galleries, Inc. on July 1, 1997 for $950. It was shipped from the gallery on July 7, 1997.
[2]. The work arrived at the museum in October 2006; it was accessioned on December 7, 2006.

creator.birth_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
